responsibilities: Work with architects and product management to help define requirements for various OCI storage products and infrastructure services product lines.
Make substantial contributions towards design and architecture and implement proof of concepts.
Mentor and demonstrate core values for other more junior engineers.
Write code, review code written by peers, and write test automations.
Operate services at scale and deliver critical enterprise level features.
Collaborate in a team environment and work comfortably in a collaborative, agile environment.
category: Prompt Engineering and Large Language Models (LLMs)
activity: Fine-tuning and customization of language models
analysis: The job responsibilities focus on working with architects and product management, contributing to design and architecture, mentoring, coding, and operating services at scale. There is no mention of working with language models or fine-tuning them for domain-specific tasks. The responsibilities are more aligned with software engineering and infrastructure services rather than language model customization.
